entry.title: Domaine Taupenot Merme PC Gevrey Chambertin Bel Air 2016 - Case of 12
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 1932.00

Wine Name:  PC Gevrey Chambertin Bel Air
Winery:  Domaine Taupenot Merme
Location:  Nuits St Georges, Côte de Nuits, Bourgogne, France
Vintage:  2016

The 2016 Gevrey-Chambertin 1er Cru Bel Air was affected by the frost, around 50% to 60% lost this vintage (equating to four barrels). It has quite a rich and expressive bouquet with touches of damson and sloes infusing the bright red berry fruit—vivacious and generous. The palate is sweet and fleshy on the entry, vibrant red fruit with fine tension and structure towards the finish. It does not possess the length of the best wines from Taupenot-Merme but it certainly has plenty of class and sappiness.

This wine special is available by the case only.  Your case will consist of 12 x 750ml bottles.  A member of our team will contact you when your wine is ready to be picked up at Commonage Market. Please note that this special is based on availability.  Taxes and deposit fee has been included in the cost.

entry.title: Domaine Taupenot Merme PC Morey Saint Denis La Riotte 2016 - Case of 12
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 1863.00

Wine Name:  PC Morey Saint Denis La Riotte
Winery:  Domaine Taupenot Merme
Location:  Nuits St Georges, Côte de Nuits, Bourgogne, France
Vintage:  2016

The 2016 Morey Saint Denis 1er Cru La Riotte has an expressive and engaging bouquet, a mixture of red and black fruit, pressed flowers and bergamot tea, complex and gaining intensity with aeration. The palate is medium-bodied with supple tannin, very well-judged acidity, maybe a little conservative but very precise with a sense of energy and tension conveyed on the finish.

This wine special is available by the case only.  Your case will consist of 12 x 750ml bottles.  A member of our team will contact you when your wine is ready to be picked up at Commonage Market. Please note that this special is based on availability.  Taxes and deposit fee has been included in the cost.

entry.title: Domaine Taupenot Merme PC Nuits St Georges Les Pruliers 2016 - Case of 12
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 1863.00

Wine Name:  Nuits St Georges Les Pruliers
Winery:  Domaine Taupenot Merme
Location:  Nuits St Georges, Côte de Nuits, Bourgogne, France
Vintage:  2016

This wine features intensely earth and moderately sauvage aromas of brooding dark berry fruit and violets that precede the rich, full-bodied and overtly powerful flavors that are very Nuits in character. There is a seductively velvet character to the complex, robust and muscular finish that is mildly rustic but wonderfully persistent. Even so, the depth of material here is very impressive and this should be outstanding in due time.

This wine special is available by the case only.  Your case will consist of 12 x 750ml bottles.  A member of our team will contact you when your wine is ready to be picked up at Commonage Market. Please note that this special is based on availability.  Taxes and deposit fee has been included in the cost.

entry.title: Clos Pegase Hommage Napa Cabernet Sauvignon 2010 - Case of 6
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 828.00

Wine Name:  Hommage Napa Cabernet Sauvignon
Winery:  Clos Pegase
Location:  Napa Valley, California, USA
Vintage:  2010

Firm, dense, chewy and tannic, built around a tight core of dark berry, licorice and cedary oak that offers shades of dill and mocha. This is a potent youngster, brimming with gutsy flavors.

This wine special is available by the case only.  Your case will consist of 6 x 750ml bottles.  A member of our team will contact you when your wine is ready to be picked up at Commonage Market. Please note that this special is based on availability.  Taxes and deposit fee has been included in the cost.

entry.title: Braida D'Asti Ai Suma 2011 - Case of 12
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 1035.00

Wine Name:  Ai Suma Barbera d'Asti
Winery:  Braida
Location:  Barbera d'Asti, Italy
Vintage:  2011

This wine is only produced in the best vintages. This wine is made with late harvested Barbera grapes, which makes the flavour exceptionally rich and concentrated. Giacomo Bologna, the late founder of Braida and the pioneer of Barbera as a variety to be recognised as an age-worthy fine red wine, ensured his legacy with the creation of this wine.

This wine special is available by the case only.  Your case will consist of 12 x 750ml bottles.  A member of our team will contact you when your wine is ready to be picked up at Commonage Market. Please note that this special is based on availability.  Taxes and deposit fee has been included in the cost.

entry.title: Domaine Taupenot Merme PC Auxey Duresses 1er 2015 - Case of 12
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 952.20

Wine Name: Auxey Duresses Premier Cru
Winery:  Domaine Taupenot-Merme
Location:  Cote de Beaune, France
Vintage:  2015

The Taupenot family’s Auxey Premier Cru bottling is more black fruity in 2015 than the villages, offering up a fine bouquet of black cherries, dark berries, woodsmoke, pigeon, soil and just a touch of new wood. On the palate the wine is full-bodied, focused and vibrant, with a good core and impressive mineral drive on the long and gently tannic finish.

This wine special is available by the case only.  Your case will consist of 12 x 750ml bottles.  A member of our team will contact you when your wine is ready to be picked up at Commonage Market. Please note that this special is based on availability.  Taxes and deposit fee has been included in the cost.

entry.title: Hendry Zinfandel Block 7 & 22 2012/13 - Case of 12
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 676.20

Wine Name:  Zinfandel Block 7 & 22
Winery:  Hendry
Location:  Napa Valley, California, USA
Vintage:  2012/13

Sweet ripe berries and cherries flirting with spice and oak in the initial aromas. Blueberry, tangy sour cherry and bittersweet chocolate on the palate. Moderate tannins and a nice, tangy acidic lift make this balanced wine our go-to with tomato-based sauces, or hearty roasts and braises that include a bit of tomato paste.

This wine special is available by the case only.  Your case will consist of 12 x 750ml bottles.  A member of our team will contact you when your wine is ready to be picked up at Commonage Market. Please note that this special is based on availability.  Taxes and deposit fee has been included in the cost.

entry.title: Hendry Cabernet Sauvignon 375ml 2012 - Case of 12
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 471.50

Wine Name:  Cabernet Sauvignon 375ml
Winery:  Hendry 
Location:  Napa Valley, California, USA
Vintage:  2012

Dense, dark berry color. In the initial aromas, pretty blackcurrant and caramel form the base notes, with soft cedar and black licorice. Very firm tannins portend a long life for this ripe, concentrated, dark wine. Decanting recommended to bring out the deeper, sweet fruit flavours and release the firm tannin grip; the wine becomes full and velvety with time and air.

Pairs well with short ribs braised in wine, filet mignon (especially with blue cheese), and rich, creamy polenta made with Gorgonzola or Fontina.

This wine special is available by the case only.  Your case will consist of 12 x 375ml bottles.  A member of our team will contact you when your wine is ready to be picked up at Commonage Market. Please note that this special is based on availability.  Taxes and deposit fee has been included in the cost.

entry.title: Hendry Mike Molly Zinfandel 2013 - Case of 12
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 621.00

Wine Name:  Mike & Molly Zinfandel
Winery:  Hendry
Location:  Napa Valley, California, USA
Vintage:  2013

This Zin is soft and sofisticated, it for people like me, who works with California wine on daily basis and drink a lot of Zinfandel and need something more complex and deep than usual stuff. Wine is earty, aromas of black pepper, licorice, dried plums and tobacoo. Tannins are really soft with a touch of Hungarian oak inside.

This wine special is available by the case only.  Your case will consist of 12 x 750ml bottles.  A member of our team will contact you when your wine is ready to be picked up at Commonage Market. Please note that this special is based on availability.  Taxes and deposit fee has been included in the cost.

entry.title: Susana Balbo Signature Malbec 2013 - Case of 12
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 400.20

Wine Name:  Signature Malbec
Winery:  Susana Balbo
Location:  Uco Valley, Mendoza, Argentina
Vintage:  2013

 

Beautiful deep violet color with exploding aromas of blackberry, black cherry, and violets framed by hints of oak and mint. The wonderful aromas are mirrored on the palate, and they are joined by ripe plum fruit and a hint of toasty vanilla, bittersweet chocolate, and a hint of mint on the finish. This is a ripe and rich style of wine, reigning in the fruit and focusing it into a long finish. A wine that truly struggles between its fun and serious side.

Pairs well with a wide range of foods from beef and pork to game birds or even meat-based pastas. This is what Malbec is all about.

This wine special is available by the case only.  Your case will consist of 12 x 750ml bottles.  A member of our team will contact you when your wine is ready to be picked up at Commonage Market. Please note that this special is based on availability.  Taxes and deposit fee has been included in the cost.

entry.title: Tar & Roses Heathcote Shiraz 2012 - Case of 6
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 172.50

Wine Name:  Heathcote Shiraz
Winery:  Tar & Roses 
Location:  Heathcote, Victoria, Australia
Vintage:  2012

The colour is deep and dark, the bouquet loaded with blood-plum and smoky, meaty charcuterie aromas. It is intense and fresh, with clean acidity and a slight bitterness that helps clean the finish - a straightforward, generously flavoured red.

entry.title: Tellurian Pastice Shiraz 2015 - Case of 12
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Predator Ridge Shop Online
Type: Wine
Price: 400.20

Wine Name:  Pastice Shiraz
Winery:  Tellurian 
Location:  Heathcote, Victoria, Australia
Vintage:  2015

Located on the western slopes of Mt Camel Range, Tellurian is one of the rising stars of the Heathcote wine region, producing an impressive range of Shiraz. 

Pastiche Shiraz is made in a medium bodied style, blended from selected blocks at their Tranter Rd vineyard to express the beauty and personality of Heathcote in a lifted, aromatic style with intensity of fruit balanced by the influence of moderate oak and savoury tannins.

This wine special is available by the case only.  Your case will consist of 12 x 750ml bottles.  A member of our team will contact you when your wine is ready to be picked up at Commonage Market. Please note that this special is based on availability.  Taxes and deposit fee has been included in the cost.
